content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Munich, let us focus solely on the rental price negotiation for this conversation. To commence discussions, I propose a starting price of 1500 Euros per month. Do you have any counteroffer in mind?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial price proposal. After considering my financial capabilities and desiring to secure this ideal apartment location, I would like to propose a monthly rent of 1350 Euros. This amount aligns with my budget while still acknowledging the apartment's value and convenience.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my initial intention was to secure the highest price possible, which contradicts your lower offer. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
